pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.1.1_0: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.1.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo chattupāhanaṁ dhārenti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.1.4_0: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo chattupāhanaṁ dhāressanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.1.5_0: Assosuṁ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṁ manussānaṁ ujjhāyantānaṁ khiyyantānaṁ vipācentānaṁ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.1.6_0: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.1.8_0: “saccaṁ kira, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo chattupāhanaṁ dhārentī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.1.11_0: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, chabbaggiyā bhikkhuniyo chattupāhanaṁ dhāressanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.1.13_0: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.1.15_0: Evañcidaṁ bhagavatā bhikkhunīnaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ paññattaṁ hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī gilānā hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.2.2_0: Tassā vinā chattupāhanaṁ na phāsu hoti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.2.5_0: Evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṁ sikkhāpadaṁ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:1.2.6.1_0: “Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā chattupāhanaṁ dhāreyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:2.1.8_0: yassā vinā chattupāhanaṁ na phāsu hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:2.1.10_0: tīṇi chattāni— setacchattaṁ, kilañjacchattaṁ, paṇṇacchattaṁ maṇḍalabaddhaṁ salākabaddhaṁ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:2.2.1_0: Agilānā agilānasaññā chattupāhanaṁ dhāreti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:2.2.2_0: Agilānā vematikā chattupāhanaṁ dhāreti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:2.2.3_0: Agilānā gilānasaññā chattupāhanaṁ dhāreti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:2.2.4_0: Chattaṁ dhāreti na upāhanaṁ, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc84:2.2.5_0: Upāhanaṁ dhāreti na chattaṁ, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
